languages.text: "Паскаль, я ожидал{mf||а}, что мой корабль будешь спасать ты, а не чудеса. Я недовол{mf|ен|ьна}".
"Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, я ожидал{mf||а}, что мой корабль будешь спасать ты, а не чудеса. Я недовол{mf|ен|ьна}".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."
"Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."
"Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."
"Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

languages.text: “帕斯卡，我本以为你会想办法来拯救我的船，而不是祈求什么奇迹。我对你的表现很不满意。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，我本以为你会想办法来拯救我的船，而不是祈求什么奇迹。我对你的表现很不满意。”

languages.text: 「パスカル、{mf|俺|私}は奇跡を祈るのではなく、己の力で船を救おうと思ったのだ。お前のパフォーマンスでは事足りぬ」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、私は奇跡を祈るのではなく、己の力で船を救おうと思ったのだ。お前のパフォーマンスは事足りぬ」
「パスカル、{mf|俺|私}は奇跡を祈るのではなく、己の力で船を救おうと思ったのだ。お前のパフォーマンスでは事足りぬ」

languages.text: "Pasqal, ich hatte erwartet, dass Ihr mein Schiff selbst rettet, statt um ein Wunder zu beten. Eure Leistung ist nicht zufriedenstellend."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, ich hatte erwartet, dass Ihr mein Schiff selbst rettet, statt um ein Wunder zu beten. Eure Leistung ist nicht zufriedenstellend."

languages.text: « Pasqal, j'attendais de vous que vous sauviez mon vaisseau, pas que vous priiez pour un miracle. Votre performance est décevante. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, j'attendais de vous que vous sauviez mon vaisseau, pas que vous priiez pour un miracle. Votre performance est décevante. »

languages.text: «Pasqal, esperaba que salvara mi nave por sus propios medios, no que rezara a la espera de un milagro. Es una conducta decepcionante».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, esperaba que salvara mi nave por sus propios medios, no que rezara a la espera de un milagro. Es una conducta decepcionante».

languages.text: "Pasqal, gemimi senin kurtarmanı beklerdim, bir mucize olsun diye dua etmeni değil. Performansından tatmin olmadım."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I expected you to save my ship yourself, not pray for a miracle. Your performance is unsatisfactory."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, gemimi senin kurtarmanı beklerdim, bir mucize için dua etmeni değil. Performansından tatmin olmadım."
